The  Accused-Petitioner-Appellant  has  filed  this  appeal  seeking  to  set  aside  the

column2: order of the Learned High Court Judge of Provincial High Court of North Western

province  holden  in  Kurunegala dated  26.06.2015  in  case  No.  HCR  114/2012  and

column2: seeking  to  revise  the  sentencing  order  of the  Learned  Magistrate  of Wariyapola
in  Case  No.  82704.  At  the  stage  of argument,  on  01.03.2019,

both parties agreed to file written submissions and to abide by the same.
